properties.Name: Landscape heterogeneity
properties.description:

properties.Name: Landscape heterogeneity

properties.Name: Landscape heterogeneity
properties.description:

properties.Name: Landscape heterogeneity
properties.description:

properties.description:

properties.Name: Landscape heterogeneity

properties.Name: Mosaic landscape
properties.description:
The richest carnivore assemblages and highest abundances were in mosaic landscapes (arable lands, forstes and shrubland).
Full article:
https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0167880909000796
